content: संसक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Close adherence, intimate union or junction; संसकौ किमसुलभं महोदयानां <ls>Ki. 7. 27.</ls> {@--2@} Close contact, proximity. {@--3@} Intercourse, intimacy, intimate acquaintance; <ls>Śi. 8. 67.</ls> {@--4@} Tying, fastening together. {@--5@} Devotion, addiction (to anything).
